document_data.mainbody:
arilyn Kendrick was a princess of the ruling Kendrick family of the kingdom of Callidyrr in the Moonshae Isles in the .
Tarilyn was the eldest daughter of High King Derid Kendrick. High King Derid offered Tarilyns hand in marriage to Prince Araithe who was the son of High Lady Ordalf, the ruler of the fey kingdom of Sarifal on Gwynneth.
